channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Business One
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Business One

item.title: CVE-2018-2410|2024-08-05T04:21:33.202Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20business%20one
item.description: SAP Business One, 9.2, 9.3, browser access does not sufficiently encode user controlled inputs, which results in a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-2425|2024-08-05T04:21:34.073Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20business%20one
item.description: Under certain conditions, SAP Business One, 9.2, 9.3, for SAP HANA backup service allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted.
